rules.description: Make the Asana app (exported from chrome) to show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + a
Make the termial open with Command + Ctrl + t
Make the Main calendar app show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + c
Make the Main (emails) show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + e
Make the Chrome show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + g
Make the bob-app show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + b
Make the Webstorm show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + w
Make the Slack show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + s
Make the OnceNote show up when pressing Command + Ctrl + n
Remap section sign (§) from British Keyboard to US's backtick + plus minus (±) to tilde (~)
